wikipedia_page.main: Bill Smith (born 23 December 1938) is a Scottish former footballer who played in the Scottish Football League for Raith Rovers and in the English Football League for Darlington in the 1960s. An inside forward, he also played in Scotland for Banks O' Dee and Nairn County.
